issue.title: SHOP map fails to open if browser page is resized before opening
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

SHOP map fials to open if browser page is resized before opening

To reproduce:
- Add a product to basket
- Open the basket page
- Resize browser
- Open perimeter definition: the map doesn't show up

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Modal has to be display=block to allow resize event to be correctly spread to all components.

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Thanks you, works like a charm! Unable to reproduce.
Can be closed.
